A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: How do these huge franchises always end up in the hands of people who don’t fundamentally understand them? This movie is a dumpster fire. Don’t waste your time or money. Contrary to what some will tell you\, this movie isn’t trash because wild internet fan theories didn’t pan out. It’s trash because there are too many cheesy\, out of place (and out of character) jokes and gags\, the characters (all of them) are handled ridiculously in almost every conceivable way and there are plot holes bigger than a football stadium\, which retroactively make TFA even stupider and render the OT movies more or less pointless. Don’t believe the positive critic reviews. Most of these “critics” are either on Disney’s payroll or are trying to curry favor with Disney so they can maintain access to their movies\, actors\, sets and properties. This is a bad movie\, plain and simple. Disney is not only ruining this franchise\, but they also don’t care that they are. It’s all just a soulless cash grab and a middle finger to the people who have supported Star Wars for 40 odd years.
